ComicInfo.Summary:
The Survivor: In World War II a German submarine rescues a lone English survivor amidst wreckage, and the kapitan learns the eerie cause of the wreck.
Ares: Released from prison, Tony finds an unexpected ally in his war against a rival gang.
The Willow Warriors: In feudal Japan, the generations-long conflict between two shogun armies comes to an honorable end.
Tunnel Rats: Long after the Vietnam War, a vet recalls his task of clearing resistance fighters out of labrythine tunnels.
ComicInfo.Title: The Survivor; Ares; The Willow Warriors; Tunnel Rats
ComicInfo.Writer: Brian Azzarello,Gordon Rennie,Ian Edginton,Simon Revelstroke,Simon Revelstroke,Brian Azzarello,Ian Edginton,Gordon Rennie
